Uses of Class
geometry.planar.Point

  • Packages that use Point 
    Package Description
    autoroute
    Contains functionality of the autoroute algorithm.
    board
    Contains classes describing items on a printed circuit board and the board itself.
    datastructures
    Contains general purpose datastructures.
    geometry.planar
    Contains general purpose 2-dimensional geometry classes.
    interactive
    Contains functionality for interactive board handling, which is independent of the graphical user interface.

      Implementation of the abstract class Point as a tuple of integers.

      Side RationalPoint.side_of(Point p_1, Point p_2)
      The function returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this Point is on the left of the line from p_1 to p_2; Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this Point is on the right of the line from p_1 to p_2; and Side.COLLINEAR, if this Point is collinear with p_1 and p_2.
      Side Point.side_of(Point p_1, Point p_2)
      The function returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this Point is on the left of the line from p_1 to p_2; Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this Point is on the right of the line from p_1 to p_2; and Side.COLLINEAR, if this Point is collinear with p_1 and p_2.
